name: Lori Burton
text: The establishment I usually pick-up pizza from was very busy. I kept driving and tried Pizza Hut. What a pleasant surprise! The wait staff was very friendly and the pizza was done in a shorter then expected time frame, for the same price as …More

name: Mrs. Google
text: Low staffed but excellent food and service. Thanks

name: Mister Gill
text: Super fast delivery! From on-line order to my door in under 20 min! Now that's good service!

name: Beth Uridil
text: It was great.  We love there buffet.   It may be smaller than some, but it is good.  We live about an hour away, so we do our shopping and stop at the pizza hut on the way home.  Nice place, good food.  Recommend it.

name: Michelle Henrikson
text: Was good but not a ton of veggies

name: Jesus Reynaldo Campos Martinez
text: Great place, there's buffet and also take out. Service was fast and place was really clean. Only downside is the parking lot has no lines so it's free for all park where you can/want

name: Jeremy S
text: Worst customer service call center ever. Sounds like they are from another country. What happened to the local Pizza Hut answering...... Tried to ask them a question about the local pizza hut store and after 6 calls being dropped in …More

name: Phil Chatman
text: Supreme personal pan was great. Service was great. Salad bar was wilting and looked as if it had been frozen.  Typical tho

name: Matt Normington
text: Friendly staff. Food is pretty good for chain store pizza. Lovely location. This is ideal place for a first date. Order for your date and impress with your knowledge of fine Italian dinning. Beverages are Pepsi which is high quality for a reasonable price. I recommend the pizza, maybe a salad if that's your thing.

name: Dean Schneider
text: Super service. Good variety on the buffet.   Even made a special  order pizza. Overall  good  experience.

name: Bonnie S Rose
text: Always love a good meat lovers pizza hut pizza

name: Theresa Porto
text: Very good. Love their thin crust and the pizza had a lot of toppings...

name: Jim Peglow
text:
Ordered deep dish  got hand toss cooked in a dish pour wait staff.

Pizza tastes good.

name: Wilma Akright
text: The staff was very nice and the price was great.  They accommodated our group of 12 by pushing tables together.  However, the pizza was so so.

name: Samantha Bigelow
text: Only lost one star because of price, which I feel is far too high.  I only ever use promo codes or buy deals.  I've loved Pizza Hut since I was a kid, and this location delivers when I need a slice of nostalgia.  I have ordered from here for years, and haven't had a mess up in a very long time.

name: Dustardy Hafeman
text: I was from out of town. No one there to seat/greet me. Rest of meal was good.

name: Korissa Schadrie
text: I will never get food from here again. I called to have food delivered to my house which is exactly 1.5 miles from Pizza hut, but they said I was not in their service area according to the computer. I told them exactly where I was located …More

name: Tony Lee
text: I ordered a meat lovers and buffalo chicken pizza. Forgot to mention I didnt like banana peppers. Server asked if I would like him to make a new pizza without them. I said no it's okay. I just picked them off. Pizza was great and so was the service. Thanks pizza hut.

name: Bastian Ormes
text: Great service and the people are all very nice

name: Phil Janowski
text: Great service and food!

name: Pam Neese
text:
Not normally disappointed  but tonight was a hot mess. Marinara sauce was watery, asked for pizza  half  pepperoni  half  mushrooms
got half pepperoni all mushrooms. Not much of an apology. I guess we all have off nights.

name: Ragnar Lothbrok
text:
Getting there when the buffet first starts at 5 is the best option. For it to be a big food chain ,they don't have much of a variety for Pizza on the buffet like they would at Stevi B's or at the Pizza Ranch. Still not bad.
4 stars

name: J. Kay
text: Thank you Pizza Hut for an outstanding volunteer Appreciation Night held for the Humane Society of Waupaca County. Your staff was very attentive and we appreciate that.We all had a great time and enjoyed the food.

name: scott B
text: Piss poor service been here a half hour only two other tables with people. Still haven't taken order. Waitress comes over and I ask if there are any special she says I can't even think right now. That explains the poor service I guess I would be overwhelmed by 6 customers too Lol.  Now I know why no one is here.

name: Montana Kovac
text: Love love love pizza hut

name: Chris Morgan
text: I always enjoy pizza hut. The server I had was knowledgeable about the menu choices and specials. She refilled my drinks multiple times and I had a nice time. I inquired about how long the employee had worked after this store. It was the employees 2nd night so that informs me management is doing there job in the training process.

name: dan loken
text: Good pizza at a fair price

name: Zak Raflik
text: Great lunch buffet and the bathrooms are the proper size for that aftershock from eating so much.

name: Jason Gurholt
text: Friendly and fast service! Good food too!

name: Donald Lindee
text: good pizza and prompt delivery with a smile

name: Aaron mankowski
text: The night shift cooks make the best pizzas ever

name: Cindy Prinsen
text: Nice little salad bar, nice pizza buffet for dinner time.

name: julie kay
text: Wow, I order a pizza weekly from this place, however tonight was the topping! Never again.  Pizza is just okay. The person on the phone would not give me a store number or manager's name. All this over a side of peppers!

name: Andie Peterson
text: I order from here often. I always get what I order and I have only had 1 order take more than 30 minutes to arrive. The delivery guys are always friendly also.

name: Ari-Anna Mountjoy
text: In the past year of ordering here i have never had a single problem until recently. The staff used above and beyond to make every stop great but due to unfortunate issues with an employee there i tend to fear even ordering their food.

name: collin timm
text: Took forever.. I frequent this place because of its location. The service is rather slow and doesn't seem to care. I leave here dissapointed nearly every time. Food tastes how it should but honestly, its not hard to follow a recipe.

name: Logan Lorenz
text: There was nothing complicated about ordering here. We ordered online, picked it up, ate the food. Nothing wrong, great food.

name: Joe Breihan
text: For a lunch buffet it was terrible lettuce was brown pizza came out way to slow a was terrible give it about a1 star and that's stretching it

name: Michael Engel
text: Not very good anymore. Pizza is more crust than anything and that just about drips grease when you grab a slice.  The only good thing is they finally updated the inside of the place. I don't enjoy eating there.

name: Mrs G
text: Nice people. Not the easiest to get to from the highway.

name: Rajean Neumann
text: Terrible service.. got soda and food before silverware.. Wrong ORDER... order bread sticks that never arrived or cheese sticks we also ordered.. upside didn't get billed for something we didn't receive.. then to try to make it up they bring …More

name: Henry Rozak
text: Nice place and good place to eat

name: Tammy Arndt
text: Loved our food!

name: Amy Anaya
text: I love Pizza Hut, my comfort food. And the deals are making it more affordable!

name: Lester Raddatz
text: Excellent as always.. man I love pizza hut

name: Greg Struble
text: Good salad bar,. Great pizza.

name: Te Er
text: Lunch Buffet sucks! Been in there for it at least 5 times and same thing everytime- everything old dry or gone they dont keep up with fresh pizza whatsoever- was told as soon as i walked in once at 12:35 "we arent putting anything else out …More

name: Lori Beyer
text: Service is awful. Came for lunch buffet. Nothing but old dried out pizza. Never refilled the salad bar or the pizza. Choices were terrible. Will NOT be back.

name: Tiffany Zastrow
text: I love their food but still greasy and overpriced. They are a little slow at times also bur like the delivery option.

name: Andi Wistrom
text: Fast and delicious

name: Jessica Lecher
text: Very nice service!

name: Mack
text: Clean.  Fairly good food.  Staff is pleasant.

name: Michael Hopfensperger
text: It's Pizza Hut. Not a real high end dining experience, but they take care of you.

name: Brian Hardina
text: Quick service. Friendly service.

name: AtlasAer
text: Delivery, excellent service, <30 min. great pizza!!

name: Andy Louis
text: Worst pizza Hut I've ever ate. Food was under cooked and greasy

name: Regina Marsden
text: Ordered 2 medium pizzas for pick up. Got home and one pizza had zero sauce on it.  None. This is the third time I have gotten home with my pizzas only to find a mistake.  No more Pizza Hut for us!

name: Trevor Kupferschmidt
text: Waited a long time to get are food waiter didn't offer to refill are drinks had to bring them to the counter don't think I'll be back

name: Ed Marvin
text: buffet wasn't good. poor quality

name: John Loehrke
text: Worst pizza I have ever had. Dry. Overcooked. Very disappointed.

name: Nina Skweres
text: Good pizza

name: Robert Brinks
text: Hand tossed pizza is da best!

name: Michele Gebhart
text: Food was good the only thing was we got there first thing when it opened and it smelled dirty...

name: Sue Drew
text: Took 6 hours to get my 2 pizzas delivered on sunday. New order and i messed up and forgot to order the cookie abd pizza hut resent deliveryman for my cookie. Rock on pizza hut people

name: Debe Dutton
text: Not good service. Cost way too much

name: Suave Tater
text: All has been good for me.

name: christian carlson
text: Was good service

name: Neal Bartlett
text: Good food 👍

name: Evonne Hraban
text: Not enough garlic butter on knots.

name: texas redneck
text: Had to seat ourselves, we had to ask to be served take our order and drinks, lack of management of employees

name: Heather Peterson
text: I'd avoid it.

name: Jeff Sieracki
text: Good food

name: stephanie conley
text: Fast,freindly service

name: Kevin Tetzke
text: Worst visit to a pizza Hut ever. Out of pan style crush ran out of hand tossed crust why we waited for hour for our pizzas.

name: Deb Schneider
text: Buffet was good lots of variety

name: Lyal Borgen
text: Awsome

name: Max Barbeau
text: Pizza was what to expect from them

name: zoey young
text: Alcohol in their crust.

name: Benjamin s
text: Pizza was undercooked super "floppy" . Was done on time order was rite service was fast.

name: Rudy Pooh
text: Pizza ok.

name: zach hanson
text: Great pizza

name: Jon Erickson
text: Great lunch buffet.

name: Tamara Zawacki
text: Had to seat ourselves. Had to ask to have our order taken and to get drinks.

name: Byron Carpenter
text: Smh... Wow!!! 😥😥😥

name: Mark King
text: It was good!!

name: Kristen South
text: They are so slow. They day before we wanted to order and they are out of bread sticks. Today ordered and picked it up. There on time and a half hour later still not done.

name: Patricia Jackson
text: Great hot lunch

name: William Torbeck
text: Great Service and Management!

name: Amber Durrant
text: Slow service. Not very clean.

name: victor krawczyk
text: great lunch for the money

name: Tiffany Rhoden
text: I was very disappointed with my pizza I ordered..i explained to the girl twice what I wanted and she still got it wrong,than the pizza was dry no sauce and didn't look good at all..not worth the half hour drive to get..i don't understand,they were very good..what happened?

name: Desiree Gunter
text: Always in time

name: Dawson Marsden
text: Worst pizza I've ever had, pizza had no sauce and was dry.

text: loved it

text: (Translated by Google) Super well in the attention and very well the taste in all your pizzas …More
